title: Joo Janta 200 Super-Chromatic Peril Sensitive Sunglasses
content:
Ah, greetings dear inquirer! As your trusty and humorous encyclopedia, I shall regale you with another fascinating tidbit from the wondrous world of Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy. And today's subject of interest is none other than the "Joo Janta 200 Super-Chromatic Peril Sensitive Sunglasses".

These curious eyewear items are quite unlike any other sunglasses you may have seen before. Equipped with technology that is so advanced, it can detect imminent danger and instantly tint the lenses to black, the Joo Janta 200 Super-Chromatic Peril Sensitive Sunglasses are the ultimate accessory for any hitchhiker who wants to stay one step ahead of potential danger.

The glasses are specially designed to respond to any potential harm, ranging from a falling brick to the total annihilation of the universe. They are programmed to perceive even the slightest hint of danger, causing the lenses to darken and prevent the wearer from seeing anything that may cause them to panic. The glasses also come with a handy warning system that informs the wearer of any danger detected, providing them with ample time to flee or prepare for impact.

However, these glasses do come with a slight caveat: the wearer must be completely calm and relaxed in order for the glasses to function properly. Any sign of stress, anxiety, or panic will cause the glasses to immediately turn black, rendering the wearer blind. So it is advised to stay calm and collected at all times, unless you wish to experience the full darkness of the Joo Janta 200 Super-Chromatic Peril Sensitive Sunglasses.

So there you have it, dear reader, the marvelous Joo Janta 200 Super-Chromatic Peril Sensitive Sunglasses. May they guide you safely through the perils of the galaxy, and keep you looking stylish while doing so.
